content: **knitted mittens in 1 strand drops wish or 2 strands drops air the piece is worked with moss stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern wi-062 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl circumference approx 20-22 cm length approx 22-23 cm without rib **yarn** drops wish from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 100-100 g colour 13 dark olive or use drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 46 dark olive **needles** drops double pointed needles size 7 mm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 20 row in height with moss stitch and 1 strand drops wish or 2 strands drops air = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
